description: This is a test class for the TodoService, containing unit tests for creating, listing, retrieving, updating, toggling completion, and deleting Todo items.

classes.name: TodoServiceTest
classes.description: A JUnit test class for testing the behavior of TodoService methods.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes mock dependencies before each test.

methods.name: create_shouldPersistWithDefaults
methods.description: Tests creating a Todo item and verifies default values and persistence.

methods.name: list_shouldDelegateToRepositoryWithNormalizedQuery
methods.description: Ensures listing tasks delegates to repository with normalized query parameters.

methods.name: getById_whenMissing_shouldThrowNotFound
methods.description: Verifies that requesting a non-existent Todo throws NotFoundException.

methods.name: update_put_requiresTitleAndOverwritesAll
methods.description: Tests full update (PUT) replacing all fields, requiring a title.

methods.name: update_put_missingTitle_shouldThrowIllegalArgument
methods.description: Ensures that a PUT request missing title throws an IllegalArgumentException.

methods.name: update_patch_shouldOnlyApplyProvidedFields
methods.description: Tests partial update (PATCH) applying only specified fields.

methods.name: toggleComplete_shouldFlipAndPersist
methods.description: Verifies toggling the completion status of a Todo.

methods.name: delete_missing_shouldThrowNotFound
methods.description: Ensures attempting to delete a non-existent Todo throws NotFoundException.

methods.name: delete_existing_shouldDelete
methods.description: Verifies that an existing Todo is deleted successfully.
